description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the content security policy vulnerability detailed in CVE-2024-1672:

1. Ensure that Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) is updated to version 122.0.2365.52 or later.
2. Check for updates by navigating to:
   - Click on the three dots (...) on the right-hand side of the browser window.
   - Select 'Help and feedback'.
   - Click 'About Microsoft Edge' to view the current version.
   - If an update is available, follow the prompts to install it.

**Details**:
- This update addresses an inappropriate implementation in the content security policy, mitigating the risk of remote attackers bypassing controls via crafted HTML pages.
- For more information on version updates, see the [Google Chrome releases](https://chromereleases.googleblog.com/2024).

**Preconditions**:
- Users must be using Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 122.0.2365.52 or later to ensure protection from this vulnerability.
